Sentencas: In this article, a comprehensive detailed dynamic representation of multi-stacks fuel cells is addressed.
Titulo: Optimal dynamic operation and modeling of parallel connected multi-stacks fuel cells with improved slime mould algorithm

Sentencas: This representation is applied and compromised for parallel connected and operated multi-stacks solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), which is considered a hot topic and research challenge.
Titulo: Optimal dynamic operation and modeling of parallel connected multi-stacks fuel cells with improved slime mould algorithm

Sentencas: A proposed control system is presented to manage SOFCs parallel stacks sharing and operation.
Titulo: Optimal dynamic operation and modeling of parallel connected multi-stacks fuel cells with improved slime mould algorithm

Sentencas: A part of this technical challenge in regards to the parallel operation is to realize equal output voltages with various current values of each cell.
Titulo: Optimal dynamic operation and modeling of parallel connected multi-stacks fuel cells with improved slime mould algorithm

Sentencas: An improved slime mould algorithm (ISMA) is proposed to set the operational parameters of parallel operated SOFCs stacks.
Titulo: Optimal dynamic operation and modeling of parallel connected multi-stacks fuel cells with improved slime mould algorithm

Sentencas: Digital simulations have validated the proposed system effectiveness with optimal dynamic parameters under various operating scenarios.
Titulo: Optimal dynamic operation and modeling of parallel connected multi-stacks fuel cells with improved slime mould algorithm

Sentencas: These scenarios include step-load changes (increase/decrease) under equal and unequal load sharing's plus emergent fault conditions by short-circuit disturbance and protection tripping.
Titulo: Optimal dynamic operation and modeling of parallel connected multi-stacks fuel cells with improved slime mould algorithm

Sentencas: Further validations thru comparisons of ISMA's results with the best results of genetic algorithm (GA) as a well-established benchmark algorithm are emphasized.
Titulo: Optimal dynamic operation and modeling of parallel connected multi-stacks fuel cells with improved slime mould algorithm

Sentencas: The simulation results show the efficacy of proposed technique and representation to improve the dynamic performance of the underlined system, for example at a particular scenario.
Titulo: Optimal dynamic operation and modeling of parallel connected multi-stacks fuel cells with improved slime mould algorithm

Sentencas: Just to figure out the cropped results, it is noted the ability of proposed technique to realize a very smooth dynamic response (overshoot = 2.30e-5 pu and settling time = 0.054 s) compared to those achieved by GA (overshoot = 4.78e-2 pu and settling time = 0.22 s) under fuel cells different shares' scenarios.
Titulo: Optimal dynamic operation and modeling of parallel connected multi-stacks fuel cells with improved slime mould algorithm
